name: Random Luck
description:
Note: if you are trying to restart the game just by going off the enemy, the player may move quicker than usual

if you want the original speed of the player, I recommend clicking the green flag everytime you get a game over

but yeah anyways this game was made in scratch

Controls:

arrow keys to move

that's all you need to know

How to play:

avoid the red block

oh yeah and if you're looking to make mods for this for whatever reason, the sb3 exists and you can download it

open it up in a scratch 3 editor (the official one is recommended)

oh yeah and there's also a windows build if you have a problem with the web build
